content.question:
Listen to the excerpt.

The excerpt for string quartet is in simple triple meter and is fourteen measures long. Which of the following statements best describes the function of the chords from measure 6 to the end?

choices.label: Both ⅶo7 and ⅶø7 chords are used to prolong the tonic.
Only ⅶø7 chords are used to prolong the tonic.
A ⅶø7 chord substitutes for the dominant.
A ⅶo7 chord substitutes for the dominant.

content.answer: Both ⅶo7 and ⅶø7 chords are used to prolong the tonic.

unit.text: 4: Harmony and Voice Leading I - Chord Function, Cadence, and Phrase

topic.text: 4.5: Voice Leading with Seventh Chords in Inversions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Use symbols and terms to describe and apply harmonic, melodic, and rhythmic procedures of 18th-century voice leading (up to 4 voices) in performed music.
